hero.heading: Hi, I'm Jorge —
hero.title: Front-End Developer
hero.description: I build modern, fast, clean, and animated web experiences using Next.js, React, and MUI.

tabs.title: +4 Years
tabs.subtitle: Experience & Impact
tabs.description: Full-Stack Software Developer with proven results in front-end engineering, cloud architecture, and data solutions. Strong expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, AWS, SQL, and Power BI — delivering measurable improvements in performance, reliability, and UI/UX experience.
extra: Improved UI performance by 30% across multiple production systems.
Reduced API latency and load times by 20% through optimized architecture.
Delivered secure, scalable React/Next.js applications with clean component architecture.
AWS Engineering — EC2, S3, RDS, VPC with 10% less downtime and improved resilience.
Developed Power BI dashboards improving business decision-making by 20%.
Led and mentored teams in agile environments while conducting code reviews.

tabs.title: +5 Projects
tabs.subtitle: Delivered in Production
tabs.description: End-to-end development of scalable, maintainable and production-ready applications across web, cloud and data environments. Strong ownership delivering business-focused solutions with measurable technical impact.
extra: ServiGO (Onibex): +30% performance optimization in UI components and state architecture.
Connect with Confluent: Kafka dashboards with real-time metrics and secure authentication.
BadBank (MIT xPRO): Full-stack banking app with authentication, validation and transaction logic.
Plug & Analyze: Business analytics dashboards cutting analysis time by 20–25%.
AWS Infrastructure Delivery: Secure, scalable deployments using EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, IAM.
Cross-platform responsive interfaces for web and mobile using React & modern CSS systems.

about.title: About me
about.description:
I’m Jorge Pedraza — a Full-Stack Software Engineer focused on building fast, scalable, and modern web applications.

Over the last 4+ years, I’ve delivered production systems across front-end engineering, cloud infrastructure, and data analytics. My core strengths include designing clean React/Next.js architectures, optimizing performance at scale, and building reliable AWS-based deployments.

I combine strong UI engineering with cloud-level thinking: from reusable component systems and state-management patterns to secure API design, SQL modeling, and analytics pipelines with Power BI.

I’m passionate about shipping high-quality products, improving user experience through motion & interaction, and solving real business problems with thoughtful engineering. I thrive in environments that value ownership, clarity, and attention to detail — and I’m always pushing for measurable impact.

cards.title: ServiGO (Onibex)
cards.shortDescription: UI performance optimization achieving +30% overall improvement.
cards.summary: Integrated shipment tracking system to improve visibility and efficiency in logistics management.
longDescription: Developed an integrated solution for shipment tracking that enhances visibility and efficiency in logistics management.
Created a web application using React and Next.js with Material-UI to provide an intuitive and responsive user interface.
Developed APIs in Node.js for data management and client-server interaction, ensuring system efficiency and scalability.
Implemented stored procedures in MySQL and executed SELECT queries to optimize data access and improve database performance.
Implemented reusable components and optimized user experience, achieving smooth and efficient navigation.
Integrated APIs for real-time data collection, allowing users to accurately track shipments in a timely manner.
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to ensure project requirements were aligned and effective solutions were delivered.
Results: Improved customer satisfaction by 25% by reducing wait times and providing up-to-date information on shipment status.
